description: Mentioned only briefly by Adlung, who says: �Oktavenbass is also familiar enough; it stands at 16' at Görlitz�.
examplesDescription: Osiris contains a dozen examples, one at 16' pitch, two at 4', and the rest at 8', all in pedal divisions. The oldest ones are listed below.

examples.name: OctavenBass 8', Pedal; St. Stephanskirche, Tangermünde, Germany; Scherer 1624.
Octaven-Bass 8', Pedal; Stadtkirche St. Johannes, Neustadt/Orla, Thuringia, Germany; Fincke 1724-48.
